General.Name: Power HF Co Ltd
General.Description: Power HF Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells diesel engines in China and internationally. The company also offers gas engines, generator sets, and machining parts. Its products are used in stationary power, power equipment, data center, mobile communication, agricultural machinery, heavy truck, construction machinery, and marine engines. The company was founded in 1920 and is based in Weifang, China. Power HF Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Engineus Power Holding Inc.
